page.title: 14MINING SUBSIDENCE
page.content: One of the main disadvantages to living in a mining area is the dreadful effect that mining subsidence has on houses, and on the roads. Over the past 2 years most parts of Mapplewell have suffered severely from mining subsidence. Damage to property ranges from, badly fitting doors and cracked driveways, right up to having to demolish a house because of severe structural damage. Most of the roads around the village are badly affected making travel rather uncomfortable by car, and often dangerous by bicycle.
